publication.title: Exposure of Bacillus subtilis to Low Pressure (5 Kilopascals) Induces Several Global Regulons, Including Those Involved in the SigB-Mediated General Stress Response

assays: measuring the expression of the SigB-dependent ctc-lacZ reporter fusion

results.effect: altered levels of 363 transcripts belonging to several global regulons
results.magnitude: upregulation of the SigB-mediated general stress response (GSR) regulon
